resources.string: Adjustable hearing protection with zero compromise on sound or comfort.
World\'s only variable passive Hi-Fi filter
A flat frequency response translates to clear and natural sound. Minuendo is able to archive a frequency response on par with custom and molded earplugs.
Micrometer precision craftsmanship leads to no frequency degradation like the muffled sound of existing foam earplugs.
By manually adjusting the lever, Minuendo can easily adjust your earplugs from open (-7dB) to closed (-25dB) and everything in betwee, so you can find your sweet spot
